About Virtuality

We are a basic yet cutting-edge website that leverages the latest encrypted chatroom user friendly platform in delivering a fast, responsive, and engaging experience for normal day to day conversations.

Our website is built with modern HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure compatibility with all devices and browsers, whilst of course you learn something about your topic of choice!

Simply choose a topic on the spinning wheel, and you'll be diverted to a new chatroom with someone else across the world for that same selected topic.

We strive to keep our website up-to-date with the latest trends and best practices, and we are constantly improving and optimizing our codebase to ensure maximum performance and usability.

Thank you for choosing Virtuality today to learn something new.

We hope you enjoy using it as much as we enjoyed building it!
